I'm living through the same history as you. And I hope you are coping well with it.

Pronouns: He/him/Monster

Politics is discussed; not always just #uspol I would like to see all signatories to the 1948 convention on the prevention and punsihment of the crime of genocide live up to their treaty obligations. I would like to see a strongly enforced global climate action that cuts emissions and enables mitigation.

I live on Kalapuya lands and am often found in Yaquina and Umpqua lands.
